import React,{useState} from 'react' import Homepage from './Homepage' import Search from './Search' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {useSelector,useDispatch} from 'react-redux' const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {user,loading} = useSelector(state => state.auth) return (
Cart 2 {user ? (
{ user.user && user.user.name}
Logout
):(Login)}
) } export default Header
